attributes.action: We the undersigned call upon HM Government for another referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The referendum should be re-run with a new rule requiring that any claim made by either side is independently verified (according to a pre-agreed process to be overseen by a panel of experts) with penalties applying for claims that are deemed to be materially misleading, including public forced retraction of any such misleading claim.
attributes.background: The level of inaccuracy in claims made by both sides in the recent referendum on whether the UK should exit the EU calls into question the fairness of the result.
